Plot: A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by The Cause and its charismatic leader.
Title: The Master
Actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Price Carson, Mike Howard, Sarah Shoshana David
tomatoConsensus: Smart and solidly engrossing, The Master extends Paul Thomas Anderson's winning streak of challenging films for serious audiences.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 76 wins & 177 nominations.
